name: Tamashi Party
description:
Bomb, Sumo, Shield and many more, customize the gameplay of your ghost with all the different classes of the game. You just need to choose your class and your skin, take your ghost into battle and face off your friends!




Push your enemies into the various traps of the map!




Be the first to take a power up and defeat your ennemis with all the crazy tactics you can imagine!




Play up to four with your friends and compete until victory!




Tamashi Party is best enjoyed with controllers. We used computer controller to play.
Remote Pla Togheter over steam to enjoy a party with your friends at every moment.
